doc:
Ramon Novarro https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ramon_Novarro 0 Jose Ramón Gil Samaniego (February 6, 1899 – October 30, 1968), best known as Ramón Novarro, was a Mexican film, stage and television actor who began his career in silent films in 1917 and eventually became a leading man and one of the top box office attractions of the 1920s and early 1930s. Novarro was promoted by MGM as a "Latin lover" and became known as a sex symbol after the death of Rudolph Valentino. Jose_Ramón_Gil_Samaniego ( February_6_,_1899 – October_30_,_1968 ) , best_known as Ramón_Novarro , was a_Mexican_film , stage_and_television_actor who began his_career in silent_films in 1917 and eventually_became a_leading_man and one of the_top_box_office_attractions of the_1920s and early_1930s . Novarro was_promoted by MGM as a_"_Latin_lover " and became_known as a_sex_symbol after the_death of Rudolph_Valentino .
